All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Cart
Cart represents a shopping cart for a user.
CheckoutService
CheckoutService handles the actual order processing.
DiscountStrategy
Strategy pattern interface for applying discounts.
ElectronicProduct
Electronic product subclass of Product.
EmptyCartException
 
FixedAmountDiscount
Discount strategy that subtracts a fixed amount from total.
FoodProduct
Food product subclass of Product.
GiftWrapDecorator
Decorator that adds gift wrapping to a product Demonstrates Decorator pattern
Main
 
NoDiscount
Discount strategy that applies no discount.
Order
Represents a completed order in the shop Stores list of products, total price and allows discount application
OrderRepository
Repository to store completed orders Demonstrates simple persistence (in-memory list)
PaymentFailedException
 
PaymentService
Handles payment processing Throws PaymentFailedException if payment is invalid.
PercentageDiscount
 
Product
Base Product class.
ProductDecorator
Abstract decorator for Product (Decorator pattern) Allows addition of features, for example gift wrapping
PurchaseReceipt
Generates and prints a receipt for an order.
Repository<T>
 
User
User represents a customer in the shop.
